item.description:
Come and join your Sitzundjiber friends and guests for a pre-marathon gathering on the Marathon route. This is a casual clothing after work.  Feel free to wear running outfits, working out clothing or your regular work attire.

We will have our own section of the restaurant and our own bar to access. 

American Craft restaurant is the former Vinny T's located at 1700 Beacon St. across from Tappan Road and the Star Market. It has a very cozy and warm atmosphere.  It  is owned by the Publick House Restaurant down the street.

You can check it out on Eatgoodfooddrinkbetterbeer.com

American Craft has all craft beers (no domestic beers) and an extensive wine list.

Light appetizers will be provided compliments of Sitzundjibers!
item.name: Celebrate mid-week...it's all down hill from here
